doc.title: 5 Ways to Split Apart the Day
doc.plot: Raised in the streets of LA, five friends embark on a journey of self-discovery through a series of critical events. Motivated by what they see in movies and fueled by the need for change, they strategically plan a heist to rob a menacing and heartless man, that may shockingly end in tragedy.
